prompts: Create a small, rodent-like Pokemon with a vibrant purple hue and large ears.
I want a Normal-type Pokemon that resembles a cute, chubby rat with a playful demeanor.
Generate a Pokemon design featuring a tiny creature with large fangs and a fluffy tail.
Make an image of a Pokemon that can sneak around quietly in urban areas, resembling a little mammal.
Imagine a Pokemon with a mischievous personality, sporting a robust body and agile movements.
Design a Pokemon that thrives in grasslands, showcasing a mix of brown and purple shades.
Give me a Pokemon that is known for its speed, with a sleek body and keen eyes.
